item.title: Merchants Bancorp 10-K
item.description: Merchants Bancorp, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 04, 2022 had 42639 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 31 - 584 instances december - 577 instances loans - 500 instances 2021 - 461 instances financial - 440 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
